definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">setblock ~-3 ~ ~-3 sfm_:ghostblock</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">500</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tp @p ~ ~13 ~</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">effect give @p minecraft:slowness 1 255 true</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
